title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response not accurately include either of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes the first criterion below, but not the remaining criteria.
The response accurately includes the first two criteria below, but not the remaining criteria.
The response accurately includes the first two criteria below AND either the third or the fourth criterion, but not the remaining criteria.
The response accurately includes the first two criteria below AND two of the third through the fifth criteria, but not the last criterion.
The response accurately includes the first five criteria below, but not the last criterion.
The response accurately includes all six of the criteria below.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must both state a per-unit subsidy and explain why to earn the point.
descriptions: The response does not state a per-unit subsidy and/or does not explain that the per-unit subsidy reduces the marginal cost, which increases the quantity produced and moves production closer to the allocatively efficient output.

The response states a per-unit subsidy and explains that the per-unit subsidy reduces the marginal cost, which increases the quantity produced and moves production closer to the allocatively efficient output.

title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

A response that earns the point for part (c)(i) must show on the graph from part (a) the price that the government would set, labeled P N MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGqbWaaSbaaS qaaiaab6eaaeqaaaaa@3ACE@ and the resulting equilibrium quantity, labeled Q N MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGrbWaaSbaaS qaaiaab6eaaeqaaaaa@3ACF@
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
